title: Honzuki No Gekokujou ~Shisho Ni Naru Tame Ni Wa Shudan Wo Erandeiraremasen~ Dai 1-Bu 「Hon Ga Nai Nara Tsukureba Ii!」
alternative_title: Ascendance of a Bookworm ~I'll do anything to become a librarian~ Part 1「If there aren't any books,I'll just have to make some!」;Honzuki no Gekokujou: Part 1;La Petite faiseuse de livres - Ascendance of a Bookworm;Honzuki no Gekokujou ~Shisho ni Naru Tame ni wa Shudan wo Erandeiraremasen~ Dai 1-bu 「Hon ga Nai nara Tsukureba Ii!」;Ascendência de Uma Amante de Livros: Parte 1 - Farei qualquer coisa para me tornar uma bibliotecária「Se não houver livros,terei que fazer alguns!」
status: Ascendance of a Bookworm ~I'll do anything to become a librarian~ Part 1「If there aren't any books,I'll just have to make some!」;Honzuki no Gekokujou: Part 1;La Petite faiseuse de livres - Ascendance of a Bookworm;Honzuki no Gekokujou ~Shisho ni Naru Tame ni wa Shudan wo Erandeiraremasen~ Dai 1-bu 「Hon ga Nai nara Tsukureba Ii!」;Ascendência de Uma Amante de Livros: Parte 1 - Farei qualquer coisa para me tornar uma bibliotecária「Se não houver livros,terei que fazer alguns!」
description:
Description :
        A certain college girl who's loved books ever since she was a little girl dies in an accident and is reborn in another world she knows nothing about. She is now Myne, the sickly five-year-old daughter of a poor soldier. To make things worse, the world she's been reborn in has a very low literacy rate and books mostly don't exist. She'd have to pay an enormous amounts of money to buy one. Myne resolves herself: If there aren't any books, she'll just have to make them! Her goal is to become a librarian. This story begins with her quest to make books so she can live surrounded by them! Dive into this biblio-fantasy written for book lovers and bookworms!  

Adapted from (https://ncode.syosetu.com/n4830bu/) / light novel of same name.
